object.name: ChatShared
object.description: This object contains information about a chat that was shared with the bot using a KeyboardButtonRequestChat button.
object.html_description: This object contains information about a chat that was shared with the bot using a KeyboardButtonRequestChat button.
object.rst_description: This object contains information about a chat that was shared with the bot using a :class:`aiogram.types.keyboard_button_request_chat.KeyboardButtonRequestChat` button.

annotations.description: Identifier of the shared chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier. The bot may not have access to the chat and could be unable to use this identifier, unless the chat is already known to the bot by some other means.
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the shared chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier. The bot may not have access to the chat and could be unable to use this identifier, unless the chat is already known to the bot by some other means.
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the shared chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier. The bot may not have access to the chat and could be unable to use this identifier, unless the chat is already known to the bot by some other means.
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Title of the chat, if the title was requested by the bot.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Title of the chat, if the title was requested by the bot.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Title of the chat, if the title was requested by the bot.
annotations.name: title

annotations.description: Username of the chat, if the username was requested by the bot and available.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Username of the chat, if the username was requested by the bot and available.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Username of the chat, if the username was requested by the bot and available.
annotations.name: username

annotations.description: Available sizes of the chat photo, if the photo was requested by the bot
annotations.html_description: Optional. Available sizes of the chat photo, if the photo was requested by the bot
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Available sizes of the chat photo, if the photo was requested by the bot
annotations.name: photo
